marketplaces.name: tenequm-plugins
marketplaces.description: Claude Code plugins with mostly skills for founders, developers, and web3 builders

files.README.md:
# Claude Code Plugins

Plugin marketplace for Claude Code.

## Plugins

| Name | Version | Description |
|------|---------|-------------|
| [chrome-extension-wxt](./chrome-extension-wxt) | 1.1.0 | Build Chrome extensions with WXT framework |
| [cloudflare-workers](./cloudflare-workers) | 2.0.0 | Cloudflare Workers serverless development |
| [founder-playbook](./founder-playbook) | 0.0.0 | Decision validation and thinking frameworks for founders |
| [gh-cli](./gh-cli) | 1.1.0 | GitHub CLI for remote repo analysis |
| [skill-factory](./skill-factory) | 0.1.0 | Autonomous skill creation with quality assurance |
| [skill-finder](./skill-finder) | 1.1.0 | Find and evaluate Claude skills |
| [solana](./solana) | 0.3.0 | Solana development (Anchor/native Rust) and security auditing |
| [styling-with-tailwind](./styling-with-tailwind) | 0.1.0 | Build beautiful UIs with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui |
| [tanstack-query](./tanstack-query) | 0.1.0 | TanStack Query (React Query) v5 for server state management |
| [uv-ruff-python-tools](./uv-ruff-python-tools) | 0.1.0 | Python with uv package manager and ruff linter |

## Installation

```bash
# Add marketplace
/plugin marketplace add tenequm/claude-plugins

# Install plugins
/plugin install chrome-extension-wxt@tenequm-plugins
/plugin install cloudflare-workers@tenequm-plugins
/plugin install founder-playbook@tenequm-plugins
/plugin install gh-cli@tenequm-plugins
/plugin install skill-factory@tenequm-plugins
/plugin install skill-finder@tenequm-plugins
/plugin install solana@tenequm-plugins
/plugin install styling-with-tailwind@tenequm-plugins
/plugin install tanstack-query@tenequm-plugins
/plugin install uv-ruff-python-tools@tenequm-plugins
```

## Contributing

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](./CONTRIBUTING.md).

## License

MIT
files.solana/README.md:
# Solana

Three skills for Solana development: **solana-development** (Anchor + native Rust), **solana-security** (auditing), and **solana-compression** (ZK compression via Light Protocol).

## Install

```
/plugin marketplace add tenequm/claude-plugins
/plugin install solana@tenequm-plugins
```

## Example Prompts

### Development
```
"Create an Anchor program for token staking with rewards"
"Convert this Anchor program to native Rust"
"Set up Bankrun tests for my program"
```

### Security
```
"Audit this program for vulnerabilities"
"Run security checklist on my token program"
"Check for PDA seed collisions and signer validation"
```

### ZK Compression
```
"Create a compressed token mint with Light Protocol"
"Build an Anchor program with compressed PDAs"
"Set up local development with light test-validator"
```

## Contents

- `solana-development`: 26 references (accounts, PDAs, CPIs, tokens, testing, deployment, compute optimization)
- `solana-security`: 7 references (vulnerability patterns, checklists, framework-specific guides)
- `solana-compression`: 4 references (compressed tokens, compressed PDAs, client integration)

plugins.description: Skill: Modern Python development with uv (10-100x faster package manager) and ruff (extremely fast linter/formatter) - Astral's fast tooling suite

plugins.name: styling-with-tailwind
plugins.description: Skill: Build beautiful UIs with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui - modern utility-first styling, component patterns, and Tailwind v4.1 features

plugins.name: tanstack
plugins.description: TanStack toolkit: Query (server state management), Router (type-safe file-based routing), and Start (full-stack React framework)

plugins.name: founder-playbook
plugins.description: Skill: Decision validation and thinking frameworks for startup founders - pressure-test decisions with proven methodologies and crypto/web3 knowledge

plugins.name: foundry-solidity
plugins.description: Skill: Build and test Solidity smart contracts with Foundry toolkit (Forge, Cast, Anvil) - testing patterns, deployment scripts, and modern Solidity 0.8.30

plugins.name: impactful-writing
plugins.description: Skill: Write clear, emotionally resonant, and well-structured content across any platform - research-backed principles for Twitter, articles, docs, emails, and more

plugins.name: erc-8004
plugins.description: Skill: Build with ERC-8004 Trustless Agents - on-chain agent identity, reputation, and discovery using the Agent0 SDK

plugins.name: x402
plugins.description: Skill: Build internet-native payments with the x402 open protocol - HTTP 402 for APIs, AI agents, and web services across EVM and Solana
